MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels. It had been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.00am to locate and repair a faulty section of underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have located a secondary fault on the network and are working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.57am on 25th of January 2021.
